name: ilearnhow
description: iLearn How - Personalized Learning with Kelly and Ken

scripts.pregen:goldens: node scripts/generate-phased-from-normalized.js --input data/sun_normalized.json --outbase data/the-sun --lang en --clone-es-fr && node scripts/generate-phased-from-normalized.js --input data/moon_normalized.json --outbase data/the-moon --lang en --clone-es-fr && node scripts/generate-phased-from-normalized.js --input data/ocean_normalized.json --outbase data/earths-magnificent-oceans --lang en --clone-es-fr
scripts.pregen:all: npm run pregen:goldens && npm run pregen:tts-jobs

author: iLearn How Team
